summary: Bitcoin wallet application with mainnet transaction capabilities
architectural_notes: Bitcoin mainnet integration required for transaction signing and broadcasting
Segwit wallet support for mainnet transfers
Reserve system needed to cover transaction fees

existing_features.title: Update frontend transaction status tracking to display signing, posting, and confirmation states for mainnet Segwit transactions

new_feature_requests.summary: Sign mainnet wallet transfers for recipients
Post and confirm transactions on blockchain network
Send mainnet transactions to Segwit Bitcoin wallets with fee coverage from reserve

Implement AI-powered transaction posting to blockchain network with automatic confirmation monitoring
Add support for sending mainnet transactions to Segwit Bitcoin wallet addresses with automatic fee estimation and reserve-funded fee coverage

projectName: Add mainnet wallet transfer signing, blockchain transaction posting, and Segwit transaction broadcasting
